name: market for fuel cell, solid oxide, 125kW electrical, future | fuel cell, solid oxide, 125kW electrical, future | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9575/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'fuel cell, solid oxide, 125kW electrical, future', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the production of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system. It has a  125 kW electrical output, a lifetime auxiliary systems is 80,000 h operation of 15 years  while the lifetime of stack is 48,000 h. The process includes the most important building materials, their decommission, the energy consumption during production and land use.                                

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
